articles.headline: Sources: Kyler Murray expected to return after Cardinals' bye
articles.description: Cardinals quarterback Kyler Murray is expected to return to play after Arizona's bye week for its Monday night game at the Cowboys on Nov. 3, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

articles.headline: Cardinals' Jonathan Gannon vague on status of QB Kyler Murray
articles.description: Cardinals coach Jonathan Gannon was vague Friday when addressing the health of QB Kyler Murray and his status for Sunday. Also, WR Marvin Harrison Jr. did not appear on the team's injury report, meaning he has cleared the concussion protocol.
